Top Biden aide meets senior Chinese official, discusses TaiwanA top White House official, Jon Finer, met on Wednesday with a senior Chinese official and the two discussed tensions over Taiwan and the South China Sea, the White House said. Thu, 11 Jan 2024 00:03:40 GMT VX3K5YRRXBNIRBVK65ABGAD6X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/top-biden-aide-meets-senior-chinese-official-discusses-taiwan-2024-01-11/Reuters世界
US, Chinese officials discuss law enforcement issues including fentanylSenior U.S. and Chinese officials, in a virtual meeting on Wednesday, discussed cooperating on law enforcement issues including the illicit flow of synthetic drugs such as fentanyl, the U.S. Department Of Homeland Security said. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:44:58 GMT UC2COBY3GFKMBHHJQZYQZKZBLY https://www.reuters.com/world/us-chinese-officials-discuss-law-enforcement-issues-include-fentanyl-2024-01-10/Reuters世界

US State Dept OKs possible Tomahawk weapons system support sale to AustraliaThe U.S. State Department has approved the possible sale of Tomahawk weapons system support services and related equipment to Australia for $250 million, U.S. Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Wednesday. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 20:17:23 GMT WLEIB3Q5VFKO5DKCR7BUWM67JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-state-dept-oks-possible-tomahawk-weapons-system-support-sale-australia-2024-01-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Focus: At CES, legacy automakers scramble to keep up in AI arms raceAs artificial intelligence becomes the new horsepower for car buyers, established automakers are redoubling efforts to match the digital features that set Tesla , BYD and other new rivals apart, industry executives and analysts said at the CES technology show in Las Vegas. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 19:37:42 GMT HKO5XIVUWNP6DC6VIAQRDU5J6I https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/ces-legacy-automakers-scramble-keep-up-ai-arms-race-2024-01-10/Abhirup Roy, Joseph White商业汽车与交通
Yellen says Trump's tariff plan would hike costs for US consumersTreasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Wednesday said Republican former President Donald Trump's plan to raise tariffs 10% across the board would raise costs for U.S. consumers, although the United States needs some tariffs and is reviewing those linked to China. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 18:54:21 GMT 5JDUZQRQPZMUDCMP6VLFQLG33Y https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/yellen-says-trumps-tariff-plan-would-hike-costs-us-consumers-2024-01-10/David Lawder商业活力
Dozens of US lawmakers back resolution supporting Taiwan democracyDozens of U.S. lawmakers co-sponsored legislation on Wednesday praising democracy in Taiwan ahead of its presidential and parliamentary elections, prompting China to call for the U.S. to stop official contact with the island. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 18:03:25 GMT ZGKYE5XL4BLT5GUDO56RVWVH7M https://www.reuters.com/world/dozens-us-lawmakers-back-resolution-supporting-taiwan-democracy-document-2024-01-10/Michael Martina, Patricia Zengerle世界
Ecuador president says country is at war with drug gangsThe government has said the latest wave of violence is a reaction to President Noboa's plan to build new high-security prisons for gang leaders. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 15:25:36 GMT VMVKGZQRNBMWDKJLSWCXQBMR6Q https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/more-than-130-ecuador-prison-staff-held-hostage-armed-forces-target-crime-gangs-2024-01-10/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
Former ECB head Draghi consults business chiefs on EU competitivenessMario Draghi met business leaders in Milan on Wednesday as the former Italian prime minister and European Central Bank chief prepares a report on how to boost the EU's competitiveness. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 14:25:11 GMT BSI7NMN6VRODRHIJ2BFZWZLVK4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/former-ecb-head-draghi-sounds-out-businesses-boost-eu-competitiveness-2024-01-10/Elvira Pollina, Giselda Vagnoni市场欧洲市场
Maldives upgrades ties with China amid pivot from IndiaChina and the Maldives upgraded their relationship on Wednesday during newly elected President Mohamed Muizzu's first state visit to Beijing, following a campaign in which he cast China's regional rival India as a threat to sovereignty. Wed, 10 Jan 2024 14:21:52 GMT D75VYPZZVVN6HDZL2VJOQQRTTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/maldives-upgrades-ties-with-china-amid-pivot-india-2024-01-10/Joe Cash世界亚太地区
Renault banks on new models, Megane price cut to fight off Tesla in FranceRenault is banking on new models and a price cut for its Megane model to help in its battle against U.S. rival Tesla Inc on its home turf, a senior official for the French carmaker told Reuters on Wednesday.
